page.title: 18KEMPSFORD THURSDAY CLUB
page.content: A group of over 50s meet on alternate Thursday afternoons at the {Village {Hall}for tea and a chat. There is no fee but a draw and a "bring and buy" sale are held at each session. The club started in 1972 to combat potential loneliness. Average attendance is 20 - 23 with a majority of ladies. There are strong connections with the school, particularly at Harvest and at Christmas. Activities include two mystery coach tours, parties, and gifts of an Egg at Easter and flowers on Mothering Sunday.
